Downloads¶

Packages¶

Packages for a number of different Linux platforms are available for both Intel and Arm architectures via the Dianomic web site’s download page.

  • Downloads Page

Download/Clone from GitHub¶

FogLAMP and the FogLAMP tools are on GitHub. You can view and download them here:

  • FogLAMP: This is the main project for the FogLAMP platform.
    https://github.com/foglamp-iot/foglamp
  • FogLAMP GUI: This is an experimental GUI that connects to the FogLAMP REST API to configure and administer the platform and to retrieve the data buffered in it.
    https://github.com/foglamp-iot/foglamp-gui

There are many south, north, and filter plugins available on github:
https://github.com/foglamp-iot
